encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some tidying necessary. TEXT: print αἱ̣[ρείτω] in line 1; in line 2 make accent on γάρ acute, and add breathing to ἀνθρώπῳ, correct > τὸν, and correct the word-wrap; in line 3 correct accent of Μοῖραι and remove final sigma, followed by [.?]; in line 4 add scribal circumflex and correct accent of φατίξωσιν; in line 5 insert space after apostrophe and remove space at end of line; paragraphos is actually a diple obelismene; in line 8 add space after apostrophe, dot the final omicron, and remove space before [.?]; in line 9 remove space before [.2], add scribal diairesis, add space after apostrophe, and remove space before [.?]; in line 10 remove space before νας; in line 11 remove space before ντ and after δε; remove extra spaces in line 12. META remove volume number from biblio 14433; 7496 is a ‘previous’ edition; add 17496, the most recent ‘reference edition’; add biblio 13194 fr. 3 as a previous edition; add biblio 3345 no. 342 as a ‘partial’ edition; add a descriptive title “fragments of Bacchylides’ 24th dithyramb”; Bacchylides is CWKB 781 and dithyrambs are CWKB work 1784; in general notes remark that P.Oxy. XXIII 2364 preserves portions of the same dithyramb, and that the dimensions are for P.Berol. 21209 only; the Pleiades georef for Soknopaiou Nesos is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/737053);

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some tidying necessary. TEXT: print αἱ̣[ρείτω] in line 1; in line 2 make accent on γάρ acute, and add breathing to ἀνθρώπῳ, correct > τὸν, and correct the word-wrap; in line 3 correct accent of Μοῖραι and remove final sigma, followed by [.?]; in line 4 add scribal circumflex and correct accent of φατίξωσιν; in line 5 insert space after apostrophe and remove space at end of line; paragraphos is actually a diple obelismene; in line 8 add space after apostrophe, dot the final omicron, and remove space before [.?]; in line 9 remove space before [.2], add scribal diairesis, add space after apostrophe, and remove space before [.?]; in line 10 remove space before νας; in line 11 remove space before ντ and after δε; remove extra spaces in line 12. META remove volume number from biblio 14433; 7496 is a ‘previous’ edition; add 17496, the most recent ‘reference edition’; add biblio 13194 fr. 3 as a previous edition; add biblio 3345 no. 342 as a ‘partial’ edition; add a descriptive title “fragments of Bacchylides’ 24th dithyramb”; Bacchylides is CWKB 781 and dithyrambs are CWKB work 1784; in general notes remark that P.Oxy. XXIII 2364 preserves portions of the same dithyramb, and that the dimensions are for P.Berol. 21209 only; the Pleiades georef for Soknopaiou Nesos is (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/737053);
